title: ServiceNow security advisory (AV26-022)
description: On January 12, 2026, ServiceNow published a security advisory to address a critical vulnerability in the following products:
products: Now Assist AI Agents (sn_aia)  versions prior to 5.1.18
Now Assist AI Agents (sn_aia)  versions prior to 5.2.19
Virtual Agent API (sn_va_as_service)  versions prior to 3.15.2
Virtual Agent API (sn_va_as_service)  versions prior to 4.0.4
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
